original_text: Some people who passed by saw the body lying there, with the lion standing beside the body, and they went and reported it in the city where the old prophet lived.
korean_text: 지나가는 사람들이 길에 버린 시체와 그 시체 곁에 선 사자를 보고 그 늙은 선지자가 사는 성읍에 가서 말한지라

sentences.original_text: with the lion standing beside the body
sentences.korean_translation: 사자가 시체 옆에 서 있는 것을

sentences.original_text: and they went and reported it
in the city where the old prophet lived
